MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK5 postcode area of Larbert. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:32pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and we require our specialist team to assist in fault finding and repairing the fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10 PM on Tuesday, 19 January 2021.
